item.description:
It's bound to be a chilly night, so let's plan a "Chili Night" at Gloria's home in Windsor. Gloria will provide both a meatless and a meat-filled chili! Both will be mild on the seasoning scale, but hot sauce can be offered to those who desire!

Others can sign up to bring corn bread, appetizers, desserts, and beverages.

In addition to our potluck dinner, we'll plan our upcoming calendar of events and discuss other business like our annual teen scholarship.

Hope to see you there!

Since this is in a private home, you must RSVP to get directions.
item.name: Chili Night Potluck
